name: twitchwatcher
description: Earn viewer points rewards of your favorite channels without watching they.

scripts.setup: echo "Pm2 is going to be installed and the app will be running, use pm2 stop TwitchWatcher to stop it" && npm i -g pm2 && pm2 start src/index.js --name "TwitchWatcher" --no-automation

author: VyrekXD
